CustomField.description:
This field is set in Case workflow "SSSW - Article Subscription" and will be subsequently unset in code after a job is enqueued to asynchronously set the Article__c.Subscribed__c field. This is only required since the article subscription call is from an outbound message.
At the conclusion of a case update, this field should be set back to False.
Do not use this field for reporting.
CustomField.label: Subscribed
